description: Old logging roads lead to a formerly thriving remote community called New France known sometimes as "Electric City" as it had electricity long before most of Nova Scotia.  The village is almost completely gone except for the rock foundations of the buildings.
directions: From Weymouth, Nova Scotia:1) take the Payson Rd (by Foodland) to HWY 3402) turn left at the T in the road and follow the 340 till you get to Langford Road, approximately 5.2 kms3) Go approximately 5.8 km as far as the Riverdale Road (DO NOT turn to go to Riverdale)4) Go straight onto a dirt road traveling approximately 5.4 km to the parking area.If you are coming up the 340 from Yarmouth, come as far as Weaver Settlement where you will find Langford Road on your right. Follow #3 & 4 above to get to the parking area.
title: New France mountain bike trail
